properties.name: camel.language.jq.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the jq language. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.language.jq.header-name
properties.description: Name of header to use as input, instead of the message body It has as higher precedent than the propertyName if both are set.

properties.name: camel.language.jq.property-name
properties.description: Name of property to use as input, instead of the message body. It has a lower precedent than the headerName if both are set.

properties.name: camel.language.jq.trim
properties.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks
